root.name: Hocus Pocus
root.description: GameplayThe goal of the game is to collect all of the crystal balls in each level. Your main attack is the ability to shoot lightning bolts at enemies, however there are other power-ups to collect as you go along, such as fireballs, the ability to shoot rapidly, and teleportation to name a few. There are hidden rooms and treasure in any given level, as well as puzzles, which usually involve pulling levers into the correct order. There are 36 levels in all.
